Uses of Class
com.project.moviebooking.dto.TheatreResponse

Packages that use TheatreResponse
Package
Description
com.project.moviebooking.dto
The "dto" (Data Transfer Object) package contains data structures used for transferring data between different layers of the movie booking application.
com.project.moviebooking.service
The "service" package contains service interfaces and implementations responsible for implementing business logic and orchestrating operations within the movie booking application.
com.project.moviebooking.service.impl
The "impl" (Implementation) package contains concrete implementations of service interfaces responsible for executing business logic and operations within the movie booking application.
com.project.moviebooking.util
The "util" package contains utility classes and helper functions used across various modules within the movie booking application.

    private TheatreResponse
    ShowResponse.theatreResponse
